Verified Learning Engine (VLE) transforms unstructured online learning into verified, goal-oriented skill progression. Progress is measured by demonstrated ability ‚Äî not course completion.

Core Capabilities
of Verified Learning Engine

Goal Selection

Users choose a target role or learning objective. Learning gains direction through competency graphs.

üìä

Competency Graph

Skills are structured as interconnected competencies. Dependencies define progression logic.

üîí

Locked Progression

Competencies unlock only after prerequisites are verified. Prevents skipping and false advancement.

‚úÖ

Verification System

Progress requires demonstrated ability through verification tasks. Watching resources does not unlock skills.

üîÑ

Dynamic Updates

Skill states update automatically after evaluation. Dependent competencies unlock dynamically.

üìÑ

CV Builder

Transforms verified competencies into an ATS-friendly resume. Multiple resume formats available.

Redefining
Online Learning

Verified Learning Engine (VLE) addresses the fundamental flaw in modern ed-tech: measuring activity instead of competence.

Traditional Platforms

  • ‚ùå Videos watched
  • ‚ùå Courses completed
  • ‚ùå Streaks maintained

The VLE Way

  • ‚úÖ Verified ability

Our Philosophy

Watching resources does not unlock skills. Verification governs progression.

Build proof of skill.
Not proof of completion.
